price: 60. Toysa nabiyow diggah Yallih xagni nummak isbir, kaadu Qhiyaamah ayró Yallih angaaraw asmatah sinniih nummaysewaa marih abtó ku-diinik koo aysissike waytay.
arabic: فَٱصۡبِرۡ إِنَّ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٞۖ وَلَا يَسۡتَخِفَّنَّكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.
